attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for all UK social workers to wear body cameras
attributes.additional_details: Childrens social services have been involved with my self and my ex partner. On two occasions social workers have come out to mums address and order me dad off premises without any papers being issued and also threats of legal action without justifiable reason. On the last visit the social fabricated lies about my self back to management that I as aggressive and block the worker from getting into his vehicle. This fabrication tactic was to make me pair unstable unfortunately I recorded to visit
attributes.background: Body cameras should be warn to protect vulnerable families against abuse of powers

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619166

If you are unhappy with actions by local social service workers you can find out how to complain about this here: https://www.lgo.org.uk/how-to-complain
